#summary Configuring goesmtp

= Configuation =

Most of the server's configuration is done in the config.cfg file.

= config.cfg =

{{{
# goESMTP server configuration file
[cluster]
master=192.168.1.2

[smtp]
domains=example.com

[db]
type=MySQL
username=user
password=pass
host=192.168.1.2
database=goesmtp
}}}
